definition: generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb

sentences.english: On the third floor they are selling linens.
Used to weight the flax fiber or flax caudex sample.
sentences.chinese: 用於定量稱重亞麻的纖維或麻莖試樣。
燕麥，亞麻籽，藍莓和杏仁。

sentences.english: The stone wheel crushes it to a pulp , which is then pressed to extract the oil .
sentences.chinese: 砂輪將亞麻籽碾成漿狀，然後送去擠壓，榨出油來。

sentences.english: Used to twist the flax short bundle fibers.
sentences.chinese: 用於對亞麻短纖維束進行加捻。

sentences.english: When their linseed is ripe for harvest the hemp is in bloom in our field.
sentences.chinese: 他們的亞麻籽成熟收穫時，我們田間的大麻正在開花。

sentences.english: The paper introduced the use of linseed gum for improving the sausage quality.
sentences.chinese: 研究了亞麻籽膠的乳化特性和對蛋糕品質的影響。

sentences.english: Linseed oil will soften stiff leather.
sentences.chinese: 亞麻籽油可軟化僵硬的皮革。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the solution to the problem of combing drawing-off roller licked by linen.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了對亞麻精梳機引出羅拉纏麻問題的攻關改造。

sentences.english: The current research situation and prospect of flax enzyme-degumming were summarized.
sentences.chinese: 該文綜述了亞麻酶法脫膠的研究現狀及前景。

sentences.english: The fabric could be soaked in linseed oil to make it waterproof.
sentences.chinese: 經過亞麻籽油的浸泡，這種帆布能夠防水。

sentences.english: He is blanching linen in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 他正在陽光下漂白亞麻布。

sentences.english: Your job is to stiffen linen with starch .
sentences.chinese: 你的工作是把亞麻檯布漿洗硬了。

sentences.english: Will Nitiric acid destroy a ready mixed oil varnish with the turpentine and linseed oil already mixed in?
sentences.chinese: 硝酸是否能損壞已經混合了松脂和亞麻籽的清漆？

sentences.english: The rheology property of linseed gum solution of low-concentration was studied.
sentences.chinese: 對低濃度亞麻籽膠溶液的流變特性進行了研究。

sentences.english: C arlos: Mm-hmm, you wore a white linen sundress.
sentences.chinese: 你穿了一件白色亞麻背心裙。
